name: Amr Mohammed
summary: Aspiring junior ML Engineer with a passion for developing intelligent solutions. Knowledgeable in building and evaluating machine learning models using TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn. Eager to contribute to innovative projects and further develop skills in deploying ML applications.

skills.technologies: SQL, PySpark, Pandas, NumPy, Seaborn, Matplotlib
Flask, Gemini API, GitHub API, HTML, CSS
Computer Vision, NLP, Reinforcement Learning, Linear Algebra, Calculus, Probability

experience.title: AI Internship
experience.responsibilities:
Developed machine learning models for regression, classification, and recommendation tasks using datasets from Kaggle and UCI.
Applied deep learning techniques with TensorFlow and Keras, focusing on evaluation metrics and model tuning.

education.achievements:
Cumulative Grade: B, GP: A
Coursework: Introduction to Machine Learning, Data Science, Neural Network

projects.name: AI-Powered Resume Builder
projects.description:
Developing a full-stack web app to transform resumes and profile data into ATS-compliant CVs using the Gemini LLM API and NLP.
Building an editor with real-time content editing and PDF export, leveraging Flask and PyMuPDF.

projects.name: Local Product Finder (GP)
projects.description:
Created a mobile app that identifies products from images using MobileNet with 99% accuracy.
Built a hybrid recommendation system combining content-based (Sentence-BERT) and collaborative filtering (LightFM).

projects.name: AlphaLearn Game
projects.description:
Developed a Unity game where difficulty adapts to player performance using reinforcement learning.
Integrated an ONNX model that adjusts speed and obstacles based on player score in real-time.

projects.name: Cancer-prediction
projects.description:
Implemented machine learning models to classify breast cancer tumors as malignant or benign based on features extracted from digitized images.
Utilized the Breast Cancer Wisconsin (Diagnostic) dataset and performed correlation analysis to reduce dimensionality.

certificates.name: Mathematics for Machine Learning
certificates.description: Learned linear algebra, calculus, and probability concepts applied to machine learning. Enhanced understanding of principal component analysis and optimization techniques.

certificates.name: CS50’s Introduction to Artificial Intelligence with Python
certificates.description: Studied search algorithms, logic, probability, and machine learning. Created AI projects such as a Tic-Tac-Toe bot using Minimax.

certificates.name: CS50: Introduction to Computer Science
certificates.description: Learned programming fundamentals using C and Python. Built projects including a finance web app using Flask and SQL.
